metadata.title: CVE-2015-5607 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
Cross-site request forgery in the REST API in IPython 2 and 3.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5607` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ipython - 1.2.1-2ubuntu0.1~esm1
ipython-notebook - 1.2.1-2ubuntu0.1~esm1
ipython-notebook-common - 1.2.1-2ubuntu0.1~esm1
ipython-qtconsole - 1.2.1-2ubuntu0.1~esm1
ipython3 - 1.2.1-2ubuntu0.1~esm1
ipython3-notebook - 1.2.1-2ubuntu0.1~esm1
ipython3-qtconsole - 1.2.1-2ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ipython package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.1-2ubuntu0.1~esm1').
